'''Caravan Ribat Type III Land Transport Pallet''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Caravan Ribat Type III Land Transport Pallet is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Sumeru]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a [[Remarkable Chest]] after defeating a group of [[Geo]] [[Fungi]] in the [[Realm of Farakhkert]].
